attributes.action: If Road Pricing Is Introduced There Should Be Help With The Cost For All People Who Get ANY Rate Of Mobility DLA- NOT JUST HIGHER RATE AS IN THE PETIITION THAT HAS BEEN STOPPING THIS ONE BEING ACCEPTED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DLA does not assess a person's ability to access public transport and at least when you have 2 or more children with lower rate mobility DLA just like if someone has a child with Higher Rate Mobility if you can't afford the car travel you are housebound.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
